channel.title: CAMs on Nathan's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in CAMs on Nathan's Portfolio

item.title: Interview
item.description: Can you tell me about your academic background ? -CPGE -Art et Métiers Paris, graduated in 1987 Have you worked for another compagnie before PSA, newlie named STELLANTIS ? No, I started in PSA as a maintenance manager in the Est side of France. After that I earned more and more autonomy/responsibility in the compagnie and moved to the head Office in La Défense in 2001. For my generation it was pretty common to stay in the same compagnie for a long time.
